body: I sent an appeal, using support@avicus.net, got a response from the detonator asking for my ign. I then sent the reply. I'm not sure weather it went to support@avicus.net or the detonators email. Which ever, please could a manager+ respond when they have time. Thanks

title: Appeals

replies.body: You have been appealed. However, you have been tempbanned for a week because you advertised. We felt you deserved a less harsh punishment. Now, please stop making topics about your ban.
